meanings.definition: A person's dexterity or skill in a particular activity.
meanings.sent1: Her dex in painting allowed her to create beautiful artworks.
meanings.sent2: His dex in basketball made him a valuable player on the team.
meanings.sent3: With his impressive dex in cooking, he could whip up a delicious meal in no time.
meanings.sent4: Her dex in solving puzzles was like a master magician performing tricks effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's dex on stage was mesmerizing, captivating the audience with every move.

meanings.definition: A numerical value representing a person's intelligence or ability in a video game.
meanings.sent1: His high dex in the game allowed him to complete difficult levels easily.
meanings.sent2: The player's dex determined how powerful their character was in the game.
meanings.sent3: Even with his low dex, he managed to strategize and win the game.
meanings.sent4: Her dex in the virtual world was like a secret weapon, always giving her an edge.
meanings.sent5: The gamer's dex was so impressive that other players admired and respected his skills.

meanings.definition: A type of medication used to treat certain medical conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a dex to help reduce inflammation in the patient's joints.
meanings.sent2: The dex was effective in managing the symptoms of the chronic illness.
meanings.sent3: Taking the dex daily became a routine for the patient to maintain their health.
meanings.sent4: The dex acted like a superhero, fighting off the illness and restoring vitality.
meanings.sent5: The pharmacist explained the benefits of the dex and how it would improve the patient's condition.
